18#include "BitMatrix.h"
19#include "BitArray.h"
20#include "ByteMatrix.h"
21
22#ifndef ZX_FAST_BIT_STORAGE
23#include "BitHacks.h"
24#endif
25
26#include <algorithm>
27#include <stdexcept>
28#include <utility>
29
30namespace ZXing {
31
32void
33BitMatrix::getRow(int y, BitArray& row) const
34{
35 if (y < 0 || y >= _height) {
36 throw std::out_of_range("Requested row is outside the matrix");
37 }
38 if (row.size() != _width)
39 row = BitArray(_width);
40 std::copy_n(_bits.begin() + y * _rowSize, _rowSize, row._bits.begin());
41}
42
43ByteMatrix BitMatrix::toByteMatrix(int black, int white) const
44{
45 ByteMatrix res(width(), height());
46 for (int y = 0; y < height(); ++y)
47 for (int x = 0; x < width(); ++x)
48 res.set(x, y, get(x, y) ? black : white);
49 return res;
50}
51
52void
53BitMatrix::setRegion(int left, int top, int width, int height)
54{
55 if (top < 0 || left < 0) {
56 throw std::invalid_argument("BitMatrix::setRegion(): Left and top must be nonnegative");
57 }
58 if (height < 1 || width < 1) {
59 throw std::invalid_argument("BitMatrix::setRegion(): Height and width must be at least 1");
60 }
61 int right = left + width;
62 int bottom = top + height;
63 if (bottom > _height || right > _width) {
64 throw std::invalid_argument("BitMatrix::setRegion(): The region must fit inside the matrix");
65 }
66 for (int y = top; y < bottom; y++) {
67 size_t offset = y * _rowSize;
68 for (int x = left; x < right; x++) {
69#ifdef ZX_FAST_BIT_STORAGE
70 _bits[offset + x] = 1;
71#else
72 _bits[offset + (x / 32)] |= 1 << (x & 0x1f);
73#endif
74 }
75 }
76}
77
78void
79BitMatrix::rotate90()
80{
81 BitMatrix result(height(), width());
82 for (int x = 0; x < width(); ++x) {
83 for (int y = 0; y < height(); ++y) {
84 if (get(x, y)) {
85 result.set(y, width() - x - 1);
86 }
87 }
88 }
89 *this = std::move(result);
90}
91
92void
93BitMatrix::rotate180()
94{
95#ifdef ZX_FAST_BIT_STORAGE
96 std::reverse(_bits.begin(), _bits.end());
97#else
98 BitHacks::Reverse(_bits, _rowSize * 32 - _width);
99#endif
100}
101
102void
103BitMatrix::mirror()
104{
105 for (int x = 0; x < _width; x++) {
106 for (int y = x + 1; y < _height; y++) {
107 if (get(x, y) != get(y, x)) {
108 flip(y, x);
109 flip(x, y);
110 }
111 }
112 }
113}
114
115bool
116BitMatrix::findBoundingBox(int &left, int& top, int& width, int& height, int minSize) const
117{
118 int right, bottom;
119 if (!getTopLeftOnBit(left, top) || !getBottomRightOnBit(right, bottom) || bottom - top + 1 < minSize)
120 return false;
121
122#ifdef ZX_FAST_BIT_STORAGE
123 for (int y = top; y <= bottom; y++ ) {
124 for (int x = 0; x < left; ++x)
125 if (get(x, y)) {
126 left = x;
127 break;
128 }
129 for (int x = _width-1; x > right; x--)
130 if (get(x, y)) {
131 right = x;
132 break;
133 }
134 }
135#else
136 for (int y = top; y <= bottom; y++)
137 {
138 for (int x32 = 0; x32 < _rowSize; x32++)
139 {
140 uint32_t theBits = _bits[y * _rowSize + x32];
141 if (theBits != 0)
142 {
143 if (x32 * 32 < left) {
144 int bit = 0;
145 while ((theBits << (31 - bit)) == 0) {
146 bit++;
147 }
148 if ((x32 * 32 + bit) < left) {
149 left = x32 * 32 + bit;
150 }
151 }
152 if (x32 * 32 + 31 > right) {
153 int bit = 31;
154 while ((theBits >> bit) == 0) {
155 bit--;
156 }
157 if ((x32 * 32 + bit) > right) {
158 right = x32 * 32 + bit;
159 }
160 }
161 }
162 }
163 }
164#endif
165
166 width = right - left + 1;
167 height = bottom - top + 1;
168 return width >= minSize && height >= minSize;
169}
170
171bool
172BitMatrix::getTopLeftOnBit(int& left, int& top) const
173{
174 int bitsOffset = std::distance(_bits.begin(), std::find_if(_bits.begin(), _bits.end(), [](auto v) { return v; }));
175 if (bitsOffset == (int)_bits.size()) {
176 return false;
177 }
178 top = bitsOffset / _rowSize;
179 left = (bitsOffset % _rowSize);
180#ifndef ZX_FAST_BIT_STORAGE
181 left = left * 32 + BitHacks::NumberOfTrailingZeros(_bits[bitsOffset]);
182#endif
183 return true;
184}
185
186bool
187BitMatrix::getBottomRightOnBit(int& right, int& bottom) const
188{
189 int bitsOffset =
190 _bits.size() - 1 -
191 std::distance(_bits.rbegin(), std::find_if(_bits.rbegin(), _bits.rend(), [](auto v) { return v; }));
192 if (bitsOffset < 0) {
193 return false;
194 }
195
196 bottom = bitsOffset / _rowSize;
197 right = (bitsOffset % _rowSize);
198#ifndef ZX_FAST_BIT_STORAGE
199 right = right * 32 + 31 - BitHacks::NumberOfLeadingZeros(_bits[bitsOffset]);
200#endif
201 return true;
202}
203
204BitMatrix Inflate(BitMatrix&& input, int width, int height, int quietZone)
205{
206 const int codeWidth = input.width();
207 const int codeHeight = input.height();
208 const int outputWidth = std::max(width, codeWidth + 2 * quietZone);
209 const int outputHeight = std::max(height, codeHeight + 2 * quietZone);
210
211 if (input.width() == outputWidth && input.height() == outputHeight)
212 return std::move(input);
213
214 const int scale = std::min((outputWidth - 2*quietZone) / codeWidth, (outputHeight - 2*quietZone) / codeHeight);
215 // Padding includes both the quiet zone and the extra white pixels to
216 // accommodate the requested dimensions.
217 const int leftPadding = (outputWidth - (codeWidth * scale)) / 2;
218 const int topPadding = (outputHeight - (codeHeight * scale)) / 2;
219
220 BitMatrix result(outputWidth, outputHeight);
221
222 for (int inputY = 0, outputY = topPadding; inputY < input.height(); ++inputY, outputY += scale) {
223 for (int inputX = 0, outputX = leftPadding; inputX < input.width(); ++inputX, outputX += scale) {
224 if (input.get(inputX, inputY))
225 result.setRegion(outputX, outputY, scale, scale);
226 }
227 }
228
229 return result;
230}
231
232BitMatrix Deflate(const BitMatrix& input, int width, int height, int top, int left, int subSampling)
233{
234 BitMatrix result(width, height);
235 for (int y = 0; y < result.height(); y++) {
236 int yOffset = top + y * subSampling;
237 for (int x = 0; x < result.width(); x++) {
238 if (input.get(left + x * subSampling, yOffset))
239 result.set(x, y);
240 }
241 }
242 return result;
243
244}
245
